body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Edward Richardson. May I have your name, please?

Hi Edward, this is Tammy Patterson.

Hi Tammy! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?

I'm feeling quite relieved. I wanted to confirm my daughter's violin lessons schedule.

I'm glad to help with that. Could you please provide me the student ID for your daughter?

Of course! Her student ID is one two three four five.

Thank you, Tammy. Could I also have your contact phone number to verify your account?

Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

Thank you for the information. I've confirmed that your daughter's violin lessons are scheduled for Tuesdays and Thursdays at three PM.

That's perfect! Thank you so much for confirming, Edward.

You're welcome, Tammy. I'm glad I could assist you. Thank you for choosing Harmony Music School, and have a great day!

Thanks again, Edward. You too!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Edward Richardson from a random business discusses random situation with Tammy Patterson. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

I'm feeling quite relieved. I wanted to confirm my daughter's violin lessons schedule.

I'm glad to help with that. Could you please provide me the student ID for your daughter?

Of course! Her student ID is one two three four five.

Thank you, Tammy. Could I also have your contact phone number to verify your account?

Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

Thank you for the information. I've confirmed that your daughter's violin lessons are scheduled for Tuesdays and Thursdays at three PM.

That's perfect! Thank you so much for confirming, Edward.

You're welcome, Tammy. I'm glad I could assist you. Thank you for choosing Harmony Music School, and have a great day!

Thanks again, Edward. You too!
